Message:
I never knew
how terrifying it was
to make a choice like this...

We’ve always pushed
these kinds of fears
on to Leader Lucille...

I’m sorry...for only ever
depending on you
this whole time...

But, I still...
want to be your friend...!

In a trembling voice,
I shouted my choice
to the other witches.

“Leaving them to die
just because they’re humans...
That’d make us no different
from those witch hunters!”

In response to my outburst,
a witch anxiously asked,

“Leader Lucille isn’t here,
so this’s our choice to make!

If we just sit back and
do nothing...then we don’t
deserve to call ourselves
her friends!”

With shaking legs,
I head for the gate.

I don’t know if what
I’m doing is right...
But, I’m just gonna follow
what my heart’s telling me...!

Even if I can’t be the one
standing by your side,
I at least want to hold
my head up high...
as your friend...!
